page.title: 02LANDSCAPE & COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: To the S.E.{WINGFIELD}is overshadowed by the{WESTBURY HILLS}.The scarp slope rises to over 700ft..On a clear day you can see the WHITE HORSE. Directly in front of the hills is the tall cement factory chimney belching smoke. On a windy day this shows clearly the wind's direction . Our area has gentle hills and some woods. It is split into {four sections}by two busy roads which meet in the middle of {WINGFIELD}. This junction is dangerous with poor visibility on the Bradford side. In the past 3 years 9 accidents have been reported but many others have occurred .The{PARISH COUNCIL}would like a roundabout but the County Council will not agree.Presently heavy lorries ( over 3 tons ) turn towards{FROME}or {} {BRADFORD}because the local authority will not strengthen Farleigh Bridge.
